Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory751.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'Yalin has recovered from her fever and is now resting in the newly constructed temporary ward.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I can see that you really know how to look after people, Boccioni...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "Perhaps it's because of... the feeling of guilt...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "I'm also wondering what it'd be like to stay here after the mission ends.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'This ties in with the "heart" you\'re always talking about, doesn\'t it?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Boccioni rarely shows any doubt, but now his confident mask finally cracks.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Please trust your own judgment.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hanying smiles with a sense of relief.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'All these feelings... are part of the "heart."', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Boccioni touches the casing of his processor.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'Then my heart should be here, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'By the way, why did you suddenly decide to...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'With you and Dazhu here, I feel completely reassured.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Just as Commandant said... this is the beginning of your new life.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hanying gazes out at the land before her.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'But there are still many people out there who need to find a home.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'I see.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'So, when are you setting off?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory752.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: "You wake from your exhaustion and unconsciously call out Hanying's name."}
{3: "It's probably already evening. You haven't fully shaken off your sleep yet, but you stand up nonetheless."}
{3: 'As you recall the day you first met Hanying, an inexplicable sense of emptiness fills your heart.'}
{3: 'The door opens, revealing that familiar figure. You meet eyes and share a warm smile.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Would you like some water first?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying pours a glass of warm water and hands it to you. The moment you take a sip, you feel yourself waking up.'}
{2: 'I thought you were doing that again...', 3: '46'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: '"That again"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leaving without saying goodbye again.', 3: '48'}
{3: "Words that once felt hard to say now flow effortlessly—maybe it's because you just woke up, or maybe it's simply a newfound habit."}
{3: "She doesn't respond at first. After a long pause, she speaks again."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "You're hungry, aren't you... How about...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'How about we finish making that meal together?', 3: '55'}
{3: 'Hanying nods slightly, and the two of you walk into the kitchen.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory731.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory731.jpg'}
{3: "You whip up a few simple home-cooked dishes and only then realize you're starving."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "It's my first time cooking with you, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: "She glances at you, noticing that you're too hungry to care about your manners."}
{3: "Maybe she's lost in thought; maybe she's observing."}
{3: 'Or maybe trying to remember something.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Is this enough?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'If you need more, I can make some extra...', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's already perfect!", 3: '69'}
{2: 'These simple, warm foods...', 3: '70'}
{2: 'They truly capture the feeling of "home."', 3: '71'}
{3: 'Hanying responds with a gentle smile.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory556.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.8', 5: '0'}
{3: 'The night grows as gentle as her smile. After your "breakfast," you step outside and settle on the bench by the doorway, feeling restless.'}
{3: 'Yet you wish you could prolong these moments indefinitely.'}
{3: "You finally muster up your courage to open your terminal with a determined resolve, relieved to find there's no data that needs processing."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: '"Ne\'er cast a clout till May be out." Commandant, you need to take good care of yourself.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying drapes a coat over you with one hand.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.8', 4: '0.5', 5: '1'}
{3: 'The sky clears and brightens as if washed clean by the storm.'}
{3: 'Hanying gracefully turns and sits beside you, letting her hair flow like a waterfall, displaying a rare lazy expression.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Is the return ship arriving tomorrow afternoon?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Naturally, every story must come to an end.'}
{3: "But there's a hint of sincerity in this farewell."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I've gone through similar goodbyes many times before.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Whether it's Kowloong, Pulao, or...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I've always been the one others have to wait for, and that continues to be the case now.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Memories shimmer in Hanying's eyes."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "After this, I'll become the one who waits.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'In those emotionally rich eyes, there is no plea for you to stay—instead, they radiate encouragement alongside a tinge of regret.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'This might sound presumptuous, but...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Can we truly become a family?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Her tone sounds like she's letting go of some burden."}
{2: 'I already consider you as family, Hanying.', 3: '107', 4: '...Sister?', 5: '109'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Maybe that's the feeling.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'It allows me to say these things...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'You can call me whatever you like.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Since a family member is leaving on a long journey...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying stands up and takes out a pipa from the room.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "I'll send you off with a song.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'Her silhouette stands like a lotus flower bathed in the chilly moonlight.'}
{3: 'She also resembles a solo performer under a stage spotlight.'}
{3: "With a delicate pluck, she silences all the nighttime forest's clamor, and nature holds its breath."}
{3: 'Then, her fingertips send gentle waves across the strings.'}
{3: 'Ripples of dreams begin to form.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryLianyi.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiYinghuochong.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory555.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory555.jpg'}
{3: 'A kite dances gracefully in the nearby low sky.'}
{3: 'You chase after it with all your might, but it becomes increasingly elusive.'}
{3: 'The kite slowly fades into the azure sky, transforming into a solitary sailboat gliding above.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory558.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory558.jpg'}
{3: "The wind continues to blow, stirring the terraced fields at the mountain's base, where scattered figures tend to their crops."}
{3: 'Misty rain descends, melting into the creek and brushing the spring day with delicate shades of green.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory557.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory557.jpg'}
{3: 'Before you realize it, you have already boarded a light boat drifting along the stream.'}
{3: 'The landscape unfolds like a familiar painting, and a butterfly gracefully lands on your fingertip.'}
{3: 'Shrouded in delicate clouds, it soars toward its homeland.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiYinghuochong.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory556.jpg'}
{3: 'The sound of the strings slowly fades.'}
{3: 'A few cuckoos perch upon the eaves.'}
{3: 'A bionic swallow places the final twig in its nest.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory752.jpg'}
{3: 'Hanying gently lifts the commandant already leaning in her arms and calmly places the human on the bed, adjusting the pillows and blankets.'}
{3: 'She reminisces about the past, amazed at how skilled she still is at this task.'}
{3: 'Hanying sits at the head of the bed and whispers softly.'}
{3: 'After that, she slowly leans toward this new "family member" in the most tender way.'}
